42.cuh: Mũrimo wa korona kana COVID-19 nĩ mũrimo mwerũ. Mũrimo ũyũ wo-nekanire rita rĩa mbere nthĩ ya Caĩna tarĩki 31 Mweri wa Ĩkũmi na Ĩĩrĩ, 2019. Ndariri cia mũrimo ũyũ nĩ ta cia ncooma, na nwa ũrage antũ marĩa makanyagĩrĩrua mũno nĩ u. Mũrimo ũyũ nĩũtambĩtue nthĩ mĩngĩ mũno cia nthĩ ĩno. Kaumo ka mũrimo ũyũ gaticĩkene nkinya rĩu.
42.en: Coronavirus, also known as COVID-19, is a new virus. It was first reported in China on 31 December 2019. It has flu-like symptoms and can cause death in some severe cases. It is widespread in many countries around the world. The origin of the disease is not yet known.

53.cuh: Mũntũ ũrĩ na mũrimo wa nkoro
53.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

54.cuh: Mũntũ ũrĩ na mũrimo wa nkoro
54.en: Person with a heart condition or disease

55.cuh: Antũ ma mĩaka yonthe nwa magwatwe nĩ mũrimo ũyũ. Antũ akũrũ na marĩa marĩ na mĩrimo ĩngĩ ta beeba, mũrimo wa cukari, mũrimo wa nkoro na gũcamũka nthakame nwa mabotwe mũno nĩ mũrimo ũyũ.
55.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

56.cuh: Antũ ma mĩaka yonthe nwa magwatwe nĩ mũrimo ũyũ. Antũ akũrũ na marĩa marĩ na mĩrimo ĩngĩ ta beeba, mũrimo wa cukari, mũrimo wa nkoro na gũcamũka nthakame nwa mabotwe mũno nĩ mũrimo ũyũ.
56.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

57.cuh: Antũ ma mĩaka yonthe nwa magwatwe nĩ mũrimo ũyũ. Antũ akũrũ na marĩa marĩ na mĩrimo ĩngĩ ta beeba, mũrimo wa cukari, mũrimo wa nkoro na gũcamũka nthakame nwa mabotwe mũno nĩ mũrimo ũyũ.
57.en: People of all ages can become infected with this new virus. The elderly and people with pre-existing conditions (such as asthma, diabetes, heart disease, high blood pressure) seem more likely to become seriously ill from this virus.

68.cuh: Ndariri cia mũrimo wa korona nĩ ta cia ncooma: Kũgĩa mwanki mwĩrĩ, gũkorora makorora matĩkuuma, gũtuurwa nkiba na kũnoga mwĩrĩ unthe. Arwaru mangĩ megucaga ũrũrũ mwĩrĩ, makabinganua manyiũrũ, magetũrũra mamira, makagĩa rwamba mĩmero kana makabarwa. Arwaru mangĩ namo gũtĩbu megucaga mwĩrĩ, wana wegua nĩarwaru. Antũ engĩ nĩmaboraga matĩkũbatara gũtiritwa nĩ ndagĩtarĩ.
68.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

69.cuh: Ndariri cia mũrimo wa korona nĩ ta cia ncooma: Kũgĩa mwanki mwĩrĩ, gũkorora makorora matĩkuuma, gũtuurwa nkiba na kũnoga mwĩrĩ unthe. Arwaru mangĩ megucaga ũrũrũ mwĩrĩ, makabinganua manyiũrũ, magetũrũra mamira, makagĩa rwamba mĩmero kana makabarwa. Arwaru mangĩ namo gũtĩbu megucaga mwĩrĩ, wana wegua nĩarwaru. Antũ engĩ nĩmaboraga matĩkũbatara gũtiritwa nĩ ndagĩtarĩ.

Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

70.cuh: Ndariri cia mũrimo wa korona nĩ ta cia ncooma: Kũgĩa mwanki mwĩrĩ, gũkorora makorora matĩkuuma, gũtuurwa nkiba na kũnoga mwĩrĩ unthe. Arwaru mangĩ megucaga ũrũrũ mwĩrĩ, makabinganua manyiũrũ, magetũrũra mamira, makagĩa rwamba mĩmero kana makabarwa. Arwaru mangĩ namo gũtĩbu megucaga mwĩrĩ, wana wegua nĩarwaru. Antũ engĩ nĩmaboraga matĩkũbatara gũtiritwa nĩ ndagĩtarĩ.
70.en: The symptoms of a coronavirus infection are similar to those of the flu: fever, dry cough, muscle aches, fatigue. Some patients have pain, nasal congestion, runny nose, sore throat, or diarrhea. Some people, although infected, have no symptoms and feel fine. Most people recover without needing any special treatment.

75.cuh: Mũrimo wa korona ũtambagua nĩ antũ marĩa arwaru mũrimo ũnu. Rĩrĩa mũntũ mũrwaru akorora kana atiiba, arutaga tũtanta na kanyua kana nyiũrũ. Rĩrĩa mũntũ ũngĩ abeeba tũtanta tũu, rĩu nĩrĩo agwatagwa nĩ mũrimo wa korona. Na rĩngĩ, mũntũ agwatagwa nĩ korona rĩrĩa abũrũria into irĩa irĩ na tũtanta tũrĩa tũrĩ na mũrimo akĩneambata metho, mũromo kana nyiũrũ.
75.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

76.cuh: Mũrimo wa korona ũtambagua nĩ antũ marĩa arwaru mũrimo ũnu. Rĩrĩa mũntũ mũrwaru akorora kana atiiba, arutaga tũtanta na kanyua kana nyiũrũ. Rĩrĩa mũntũ ũngĩ abeeba tũtanta tũu, rĩu nĩrĩo agwatagwa nĩ mũrimo wa korona. Na rĩngĩ, mũntũ agwatagwa nĩ korona rĩrĩa abũrũria into irĩa irĩ na tũtanta tũrĩa tũrĩ na mũrimo akĩneambata metho, mũromo kana nyiũrũ.
76.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

Rĩrĩa mũntũ ũngĩ abeeba tũtanta tũu, rĩu nĩrĩo agwatagwa nĩ mũrimo wa korona. Na rĩngĩ, mũntũ agwatagwa nĩ korona rĩrĩa abũrũria into irĩa irĩ na tũtanta tũrĩa tũrĩ na mũrimo akĩneambata metho, mũromo kana nyiũrũ.
77.en: COVID-19 is transmitted by people carrying the virus. When a sick person coughs or sneezes, they expel droplets through their nose or mouth. If a person breathes in these droplets, they can become infected with the coronavirus. If a person touches an object infected with these droplets and then touches their eyes, nose or mouth, they can also become infected.

93.cuh: 2. Thambaga njara maita mengĩ na rũncĩ na thamuni, ũkĩnegiria na gĩtambaa kĩtheru na kĩnyaru.
93.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

94.cuh: 2. Thambaga njara maita mengĩ na rũncĩ na thamuni, ũkĩnegiria na gĩtambaa kĩtheru na kĩnyaru.
94.en: 2. Wash your hands frequently with soap and running water. Then dry them with a clean towel.

97.cuh: 3.  Rĩrĩa ũgũkorora kana gũtiiba, kũnja njara yaku ũkĩnakorora kana gũtiiba bo.

98.cuh: 3.  Rĩrĩa ũgũkorora kana gũtiiba, kũnja njara yaku ũkĩnakorora kana gũtiiba bo.

101.cuh: 4. Ũtĩkarĩe nyama itĩnduge na ũtĩkambatangage nyamũ irĩ mwoo.
101.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

102.cuh: 4. Ũtĩkarĩe nyama itĩnduge na ũtĩkambatangage nyamũ irĩ mwoo.
102.en: 4. Avoid eating raw meat and touching live animals.

111.cuh: 5. Ĩkara makinywa maĩrĩ baraca na mũntũ ũrĩa ũgũkorora kana ũgũtiiba.

112.cuh: 5. Ĩkara makinywa maĩrĩ baraca na mũntũ ũrĩa ũgũkorora kana ũgũtiiba.

113.cuh: 5. Ĩkara makinywa maĩrĩ baraca na mũntũ ũrĩa ũgũkorora kana ũgũtiiba.

116.cuh: 6. Tiga gũkethania na njara. Ĩgania nkeethi cia kanyua akĩ.
116.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

117.cuh: 6. Tiga gũkethania na njara. Ĩgania nkeethi cia kanyua akĩ.
117.en: 6. Avoid shaking hands. Greet each other with a nod or a verbal greeting.

128.cuh: 9. Ĩkaraga ũkĩthikagĩrĩria mageni megiĩ mũrimo ũyũ.
128.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

129.cuh: 9. Ĩkaraga ũkĩthikagĩrĩria mageni megiĩ mũrimo ũyũ.
129.en: 9. Keep informed and verify the source of information.

130.cuh: -Ringa thimũ 719 na ũkĩnarũmĩrĩra mataaro ma ndagĩtarĩ.
130.en: - Call 1510 and follow the doctor's instructions. Other possible numbers:

143.cuh: Wa mũntũ nwa nkinya emenyerere na amenyerere antũ marĩa marĩ bakubĩ nawe.
143.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.

144.cuh: Wa mũntũ nwa nkinya emenyerere na amenyerere antũ marĩa marĩ bakubĩ nawe.
144.en: Everyone must be responsible and take the right steps to protect themselves and those around them.
